Util::KillService

Util::KillService Class Reference
[Util]

Default implementation for Signal serviceThis class implements default behavior for signal handling :

  • exit the process on E_KILL
  • do nothing for all other signals.
More...

Detailed Description

Default implementation for Signal service

This class implements default behavior for signal handling :

  • exit the process on E_KILL
  • do nothing for all other signals.
